sentences.en: According to facts in my possession he can't possibly be guilty.
sentences.cn: 根据我所掌握的事实,他是不可能有罪的.

sentences.en: He described the picture as his most cherished possession.
sentences.cn: 他说那幅画是他最珍爱的财产。

sentences.en: He had sold all his possessions and left the country.
sentences.cn: 他变卖所有财产后离境了。

sentences.en: He was arrested for the unlawful possession of fire arms.
sentences.cn: 他因非法携带武器而被捕.

sentences.en: He's got possession of the house for 10 years.
sentences.cn: 他已拥有那房子十年了.

sentences.en: How did the painting come into your possession (= how did you get it ) ?
sentences.cn: 这幅画是怎么到你手上的？

sentences.en: How had this com-promising picture come into the possession of the press?
sentences.cn: 这张令人难堪的照片是怎么落到媒体手中的？

sentences.en: I packed my remaining possessions into the trunk.
sentences.cn: 我把剩下的物品装进行李箱里。

sentences.en: Prisoners were allowed no personal possessions .
sentences.cn: 犯人们不得持有私人物品。

sentences.en: She found her customary self-possession had deserted her.
sentences.cn: 她发现自己不像平时那样处事不惊了。

sentences.en: That information is not in our possession.
sentences.cn: 那则信息不归我们所有。

sentences.en: The fairy king and queen were contending over possession of the cat.
sentences.cn: 仙王和仙后争着要这只猫.

sentences.en: The finance company now has possession of the house.
sentences.cn: 这家金融公司目前拥有这所房子。

sentences.en: The land is in the possession of the merchant.
sentences.cn: 这块地为该商人所有.

sentences.en: The letter put me in possession of some important information.
sentences.cn: 这封信使我知道了一些重要的信息.

sentences.en: The manuscript is just one of the treasures in their possession .
sentences.cn: 这部手稿只是他们的珍藏之一。

sentences.en: The unlawful possession of drugs is a serious crime.
sentences.cn: 非法拥有毒品是严重犯罪行为.

sentences.en: The widow is in possession of a large fortune.
sentences.cn: 那个寡妇占有大笔财产.

sentences.en: They were imprisoned for possession of drugs.
sentences.cn: 他们因拥有毒品而被监禁。

sentences.en: Those documents are now in the possession of the Guardian.
sentences.cn: 那些文件目前在《卫报》手里。

sentences.en: to be arrested for possession of a controlled substance
sentences.cn: 因藏有毒品而被捕

sentences.en: We didn’t take possession of (= get and start using ) the car until a few days after the auction.
sentences.cn: 拍卖会过后几天我们才正式拿到那辆车。

words.tran_cn: 占有的；所有的；所有格的；占有欲强的

phrases.tran_cn: 使完全占有；转交所有权；给予引渡
被某人占有；属于…；为…所有

trans.tran_cn: 占有，所有物，财产，殖民地，着魔，领地
trans.tran_en: if something is in your possession, you own it, or you have obtained it from somewhere
